meanings.definition: The beliefs or practices of an ogre.
meanings.sent1: Ogreism can involve living in a dark cave and scaring people.
meanings.sent2: The village was filled with fear due to the ogreism of the creature in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The ogre's ogreism led to some comical misunderstandings with the townsfolk.
meanings.sent4: Her stubbornness was like an ogreism that couldn't be reasoned with.
meanings.sent5: The ogreism of the character in the story made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The characteristic behavior or qualities of an ogre.
meanings.sent1: The ogreism of the giant creature was evident in its loud roars.
meanings.sent2: His ogreism showed in his love for solitude and darkness.
meanings.sent3: The ogre's ogreism made him a unique addition to the fairy tale world.
meanings.sent4: The ogreism of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The ogreism of the villain made the story more thrilling and suspenseful.
